SOLVED!

This is the failure mode for when rustc prior to 1.60 encounters a requirement for a version of a crate which uses namespaced features.

So if you ever encounter anything like this, check the dependency's Cargo.toml and see if they're using namespaced features.

This problem will occur if *any* crate in a namespace includes a dependency which uses namespaced cargo features.

As soon as you add a single dependency with namespaced features anywhere in the workspace, the whole workspace's MSRV becomes 1.60.
